name: streamystats
description: StreamyStats is a self-hosted analytics dashboard for Twitch streamers, aggregating stream data into charts and performance insights.
features: Twitch analytics: Aggregates stream statistics from Twitch API.
Viewer trends: Charts viewer counts and peak viewership over time.
Follower growth: Tracks follower count changes and growth rate.
Stream schedule: Displays streaming frequency and consistency metrics.
Chat activity: Analyzes chat message volume and engagement.
Clip tracking: Monitors most popular clips and their view counts.
Subscriber stats: Tracks subscriber counts and subscription trends.
Revenue estimates: Calculates estimated earnings from subs and bits.
Comparison tools: Compares performance across different time periods.
Export reports: Downloads statistics for presentations or analysis.
Mobile responsive: Views analytics from smartphones and tablets.
Historical data: Stores long-term data for trend analysis.
